name: Task Completeness
description: Tests the model's ability to completely fulfill all requirements of a presentation task

prompts.text: Create a marketing presentation for a new smartphone with the following specific requirements: 1) Include exactly 7 slides, 2) Cover product features, target demographics, competitive advantages, pricing strategy, and launch timeline, 3) Include speaker notes for each slide, 4) Suggest 3 data visualizations, and 5) Provide a slide transition recommendation between each slide.

Create a quarterly business review presentation with these requirements: 1) An executive summary slide with 3 key highlights, 2) Financial results comparing to both previous quarter and same quarter last year, 3) Department-specific metrics for Sales, Marketing, and Operations, 4) Risk assessment section with at least 2 identified risks and mitigation strategies, 5) Next quarter goals with specific KPIs, and 6) An appendix with supporting data tables.
expected_elements: Financial comparisons to both time periods
Risk section with at least 2 risks and mitigations
Next quarter goals with specific KPIs
